hooks.command: which gh > /dev/null 2>&1 || (curl -sL https://api.github.com/repos/cli/cli/releases/latest | grep -o '"tag_name": *"[^"]*"' | head -1 | sed 's/"tag_name": *"//;s/"//' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'cd /tmp && curl -sLO "https://github.com/cli/cli/releases/download/{}/gh_$(echo {} | sed s/v//)_linux_amd64.tar.gz" && tar -xzf gh_*_linux_amd64.tar.gz && sudo cp gh_*_linux_amd64/bin/gh /usr/local/bin/gh && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/gh && rm -rf gh_*_linux_amd64*')
